brands.name: Erigo
brands.description: Erigo is an Indonesian streetwear brand that was founded in 2011 by Muhammad Sadad. The brand has since become one of the most popular streetwear brands in Indonesia, and it has also expanded into other countries in Southeast Asia. Erigo is known for its unique and stylish designs, and it has a wide range of products, including t-shirts, hoodies, jackets, pants, and accessories. The brand has also collaborated with a number of popular celebrities and influencers, which has helped to increase its popularity. If you are looking for stylish and affordable streetwear, Erigo is a great option. The brand has a wide range of products to choose from, and its designs are sure to turn heads.

brands.name: Compass
brands.description: Compass is a popular brand that has been around since 1998. Compass is known for its high-quality shoes, which are made with premium materials and construction. The brand offers a wide range of styles, including sneakers, boots, and sandals. Compass shoes are popular among both men and women, and they are often seen as a symbol of Indonesian culture.

brands.name: Hijack Sandals
brands.description: Hijack Sandals is an Indonesian footwear brand founded in 2010 by Hadi Ismanto. The brand is known for its comfortable and stylish sandals that are made with high-quality materials. Hijack Sandals sandals are made with Vibram soles, which are known for their durability and traction.

brands.name: Maternal Disaster
brands.description: Maternal Disaster is a clothing brand and art collective based in Bandung, Indonesia. They were founded in 2003 by Arief Budiman and have since released a number of clothing lines, comics, and music albums. Their work is known for its dark, surreal, and often political themes. The name 'Maternal Disaster' is a reference to the concept of the 'maternal abyss,' which is a term used to describe the fear of childbirth and the loss of control that comes with it. The brand's work often explores these themes, as well as other issues such as death, violence, and the nature of reality.

brands.name: Lanccelot
brands.description: Lanccelot is a watch brand based in Jakarta, Indonesia. They were founded in 2014 by Jason Lee and have since become one of the most popular watch brands in Indonesia. Lanccelot watches are known for their classic and timeless design, as well as their interchangeable straps. The name 'Lanccelot' is a reference to the legendary knight Lancelot, who was one of the Knights of the Round Table. The brand's logo features a stylized image of Lancelot's sword, Excalibur.
